mapper.select: select o.*,c.id cid,c.name cname from t_order o left join t_customer c on o.customer_id = c.id
select o.*,c.id cid,c.name cname from t_order o left join t_customer c on o.customer_id = c.id where o.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_sn, create_time, total_price, state, customer_id) values (#{order_sn}, #{create_time}, #{total_price}, #{state}, #{customer_id})
mapper.update: update t_order set order_sn=#{order_sn},total_price=#{total_price},state=#{state}, customer_id=#{customer_id} where id=#{id}
